sections.heading: of the Nebraska State Historical Society; restriction on other service
sections.text: The Director of the Nebraska State Historical Society shall not be a board member of or serve in an advisory capacity for any charitable organization that provides money or other support to the Nebraska State Historical Society.S

82-101.04.Director of the Nebraska State Historical Society; restriction on other service.

The Director of the Nebraska State Historical Society shall not be a board member of or serve in an advisory capacity for any charitable organization that provides money or other support to the Nebraska State Historical Society.

SourceLaws 2024, LB1169, ยง 11.
